column4: I want to setup ubuntu to use multiple partitions. I want to create a small / partition with a large /home partition. What is a reasonable size for the / partition? I don't want to run out of space on that, but I don't want there to be a ton of unused space on it either.
how big is your HD, and what are you going to be doing on the computer?
It's a 150gb hard drive and it will mostly just be used as a file server
